sql_json.natural_language: Show all emails today that mention ‘order’.
sql_json.generated_sql: SELECT messageId, threadId, fromEmail, subject, sentAt, snippet FROM email_search_index WHERE DATE(sentAt) = CURRENT_DATE() AND 'order' IN UNNEST(searchTerms) ORDER BY sentAt DESC LIMIT 1;

sdk_json.from_sql: SELECT messageId, threadId, fromEmail, subject, sentAt, snippet FROM email_search_index WHERE DATE(sentAt) = CURRENT_DATE() AND 'order' IN UNNEST(searchTerms) ORDER BY sentAt DESC LIMIT 1;
